review: I absolutely love this one but there is one huge issue. It randomly stops ringing. All the device volumes are up and there is no do not disturb running. In fact I have put this app as an exception for do not disturb mode, but still there is no alarm. If this crucial issue is fixed, this app is perfect.
ras4vb: Thank you for your review! Please contact us at zeitic.co@gmail.com with more details and we will do our best to investigate this issue further.

review: I really love the app and this concept of creating customized focus sessions! I am facing this problem where the sound doesn't come even though my phone volumes are up. Hope it gets fixed soon. Also , I have a few suggestions : 1- Adding custom color to the bars would be great. 2- A todo list that you can choose for tags. 3- Maybe an optional alarm would also be great because sometimes we lose track of time and the break automatically goes on to the next focus session. Thanks!

I installed because of the interactive graph. But the app has many many bugs. 1. If I start the timer at a time, pause it in middle and resume it, and end it some other time, it showing that I completed the task continuously without break, from the starting time. 2. If I minimise and come back, the timer restarts from the beginning.
ras4vb: Thank you for your feedback and highlighting these issues to us. We look forward to hear more from you, so please contact us at zeitic.co@gmail.com and we will try our best to assist you.

review: Trust me when I say this, I've used every study timer available on Play Store. This one is so easy to use, minimalistic yet fun. It won't distract you, just simply help you analyse how much you studied in a crisp way. This is a great app for deep or shallow work, absolutely loved it. We get EVERYTHING for FREE. Please add a to do list and synchronisation with Google Calendar pleaseee
ras4vb: Thank you for your review! We will continue to improve Focusmeter and make it even better!

review: The app is very functional, there are few bugs like everytime I try to change the tag in the timer it changes the start button to fast forward for no reason. The bigger issue is how do I transfer my data to another phone if there is no individual account nor any other way to import the data which is exported from the app.

Liked the app. But I think there's some problem because it buzzes(completes the schedule) whenever I check the timer. It is weird. I am not sure what's wrong; maybe alarm stops earlier but doesn't buzz and then it buzzes after I see it. Well, I am confuse but something is surely different or wrong. Please look into those buzzing settings; make sure it buzz on time.

It's a decent app and works quite effectively unlike some others app which don't give alerts when timer is completed. The only issue I have is that everything is in minutes rather than in hours which makes quite difficult to analyse if I am studying. Hope they think about this Edit: now again there's issue. When I set a timer it automatically counts 8-9 hours. The experience is getting bad day by day as it disturbs.
ras4vb: Thank you for the review! You can display your progress in hours instead of minutes. Please go to Settings > Interface & Display > Display Completed. If you require further assistance, please contact us at zeitic.co@gmail.com and we will do our best to help you.

review: Everything about this app is good except for the alert function and I've figured out why. It will only alert after the timer end which is the entire set of focus and rest. It won't alert the transition between focus to rest, nor will it alert while on loop. I hope this can be fixed. And if I may add, I also would appreciate the ability to adjust the the timer up to the second. Overall, the app will be perfect the alert issue can be fixed.

App is great for focusing on daily activities. But the overall experience is hampered because the alert system (alarm) is not working. It's not making sound while the focus time is finished. I have checked all the settings, but It's not working. Disappointed...
ras4vb: Thank you for your feedback. May we know if the vibration alert is working? Please provide us with more details at zeitic.co@gmail.com and we will do our best to investigate!

review: It's a great app with amazing features! Except that the end timer alarms aren't working. The vibration is there, but it doesn't play the alarm sound I have set. Sometimes it leads to loosing the track of time. Pls fix this issue.
ras4vb: Thank you for your feedback! We will investigate this issue and release an update soon!

review: The greatest app for concentration. The main benefit of it is that you can see your focus statistics and set the needed time. Also I would be glad if you made the iOS version.

What a fantastic app! The very best pomodoro app I have used (and I have been thru them all, believe me). I recommend you give it a go and see for yourself, you will not be disappointed. The stats pages and layout and simplicity of the app is a beauty to behold.

It's the best app to track time without a doubt. However, it urgently needs an option to backup with the cloud; I lost all my progress from months ago due to my cellphone broking and there's no way to recover the data. I didn't want to before, but I guess it's time to move to another app that secures my data better, at least until there's something actually efficient and safe in Focusmeter. Really hope for this app to improve on this issue so I could come back again
Apps great, easy to use, keeps me focused. But every now and then, the app will refuse to let me tap the start/pause button, change tags, and skip timers. Can this be fixed?
ras4vb: Thank you for your feedback. May we know where does this issue happen at? Is it within the app itself or the timer notification that is displayed in the notification bar?

review: This app is really good but Pro feature is a subscription based. Please make it a one time purchase, most of are students. Or make a different slab of one time purchase with existing subscription based services.

Even though the alarm usually doesn't work properly, i've wanted to give 5 stars because the charts that gives you the information that how much you worked are splendid! And i always use the feature that allows me to use 2 label together. *Please improve the app in order that alarm works properly.*

Absolutely fantastic app. Very useful for employees and students. The app is very clean and great for focussing in the task at hand. Most of the features are free which makes this app the ideal pomodoro timer and focus app . Would highly recommend üëç

If you are searching for a Pomodoro app, which can be customisable entirely as you wish(like MonkeyType). This is the best app, you will definitely love it. I've tried almost every Pomodoro apps in play store. but I couldn't get satisfied until I tried this one. This Focusmeter app is so underrated now. So please share it. Because it deserves it. As per now-1st July, 2022. Its totally free. There is just only one fault = *When my notification media is off This app dont play alert.
ras4vb: Thank you for your review and kind words! Please contact us at zeitic.co@gmail.com with some details regarding this fault and we will investigate it further.

review: Best app..... No ads disturbance. Keep track on work. Works offline too. Thanks for this app:) This app has been improving time to time.
Please fix the bug of calender menu I can't go through previous month the buttons are some time seems frozen after the second previous update
ras4vb: Thank you for your review! Please contact us with more details at zeitic.co@gmail.com and we will do our best to assist you.

review: Useful app I recommend this app for everyone who is struggling to manage the time . Only small mistake is that when I choose music for ringtone, it doesn't play after a day.
ras4vb: Thank you for your feedback. Please contact us at zeitic.co@gmail.com with more details and we will investigate this issue further.

review: This app is very nice and comfortable to use. But recently i found an issue that sometimes timer alert sounds are not coming i.e. rest timer alert as well as focus timer alert. Try to resolve the issue..
ras4vb: Thank you for your review and feedback! We are aware of this issue happening on some devices and will continue to find ways to improve the reliability of the timer alerts.

review: Nice design, can modify time periods, no ads. Big "but" : it doesn't give a notification on time when the screen is locked and it runs in the background. Only when you unblock and enter the app, it gives the notification. Extremely annoying since the idea of the app is to track the time and that's the only think it can't do!

Hey, this app is great among apps for managing time and it has a lot of useful feature. I want to report a bug and I hope you can manage it in the next update. When I touch the minute counter in top left, the screen will become white and app will not show the clock for some days. The same thing will happen when I use calendar to see my progress in some days. Thanks for developing such a great app.
ras4vb: Thank you for your review. Please contact us at zeitic.co@gmail.com and we will do our best to help you.

review: The layout is beautiful and the features are minimalist and helpful to track the time spent on work and during the day. But there is a bug : almost every time I run the timer, I close the phone and put it next to me, after a while I note that the app closed itself. I have to open it again to see the progress time. It's annoying.

Best productivity timer out there for people who love graphs and data! You get to see when and how much you focused, and if and how much you've improved. The graphs are beautiful and intuitive. I appreciate that the timer doesn't automatically move on to the next thing coz otherwise I'd just let the timer tick away without being honest about my activities lol. I also inquired about the missing July monthly stats, and they responded right away! Chill, the fix will be included in the next update.

Amazing app, simple to use and very flexible. It covers my use cases perfectly. The best out there from what I've seen so far. It's still got some bugs here and there - for instance, it failed to record one focus session and notify me when it was done. I now see that the activity recorded in the first day of the week is not showing up in my weekly calendar. However, overall great job, keep it up!

Really good, covers all of the functions I need without being overly complicated. There's one weird behavior that I don't like though: having to tap next after one block finishes, and then tapping it again to start. I want to auto-start next block. A 3 second countdown timer that you can tap to pause auto-start. Sometimes (a lot of times) I forget to tap next to start the timer... Would also appreciate if the reset button only appears after you pause! And option to change theme colors :)
ras4vb: Thank you for your kind feedback! Those are some good suggestions to improve the user experience and we will consider them for upcoming versions. If you have further suggestions or questions, please contact us at zeitic.co@gmail.com

review: Too bad. This looked simple like I was looking for, and also not an ugly interface. But sadly it crashes and I cannot use it. The presentation works fine. But then it gets stuck on "please wait" forever. If I close it and start again, it crashes before it gets through the tutorial. I've tried installing again. It won't work. I would be glad to hear it's fixed and change my rating. This is what I needed.
ras4vb: Hi there, thank you for reporting this issue. We have fixed this startup bug in the latest version (1.0.24). Please reinstall with this version. Thank you.

review: I tried 8 or so different pomodoro apps before finding this one. Absolutely the best pomodoro app out there with great functionality and UI. Two things that would make it perfect: Make a feature that rests start automatically, but not the next work session. Currently, both are set automatically. It would also be great to see an additional pie chart of total work time for a single day in statistics that is separate from the current one on the calendar which shows a total day with unused time
ras4vb: Thank you for the review! We are really glad that Focusmeter worked for you! As for the features you have suggested, we will consider them for upcoming releases. If you have any other suggestions, please feel free to contact us at zeitic.co@gmail.com.

review: I adore this app. All I wanted was a sleek, pretty timer with a visual interface that doesn't crash, and this does the trick. The timer design is lovely to look at, minimal, great dark mode and shows the countdown with both a digital clock and a visual. I like the prompt to start each focus/rest timer - helps nudge the brain toward intentional productivity. It's straightforward and powerful to customise the notifications (sound and vibrate options; can play alerts as an alarm or media or notification; and alerts available for midway through timer, 1 min before completion and at completion). I just use the timer, not sure about the other features but even if they didn't exist, this is a killer app.

The best Pomodoro app. It's really complete and doesn't lock basic features behind paywalls. Apart from that, it gives you statistics about your timers, letting you see when you paused, when you canceled timers, etc. I really love how this app handles resetting your sessions: other apps that I've used automatically reset at midnight, which can be troublesome if you are still working past midnight... but this one doesn't, it gives you total control over resetting. All of this for free.
ras4vb: Thank you very much for your kind review!

review: 02/19/21 Has issues with alarm notifications when phone is offline. This resulted to me exceeding the set amount of time for each sessions and I had to keep re-checking my phone multiple times per hour to checked if the timer was done or not. I really liked the simple, minimal, and straightforward design of the app along with the daily and weekly stats, but it is not an effective pomodoro timer. This app seems like it has a great potential, so I'm really hoping they would address this issue.

I love the concept of this app, it has all the features I want, but there are a few bugs that need fixing. Some of my timer modes erase themselves when I go to edit them, and sometimes skipping to the next timer doesn't work. It would also be nice if the colour of the timer corresponded to the tag colour.

It's a very good app that serves it's purpose. I like that it can be a countdown or a timer and you can set focus and rest periods. At first, I couldn't figure out how to make a continuous session (so I could stop whenever I wanted) but I just created a new focus only time and set it to loop and it worked well. UI Is good too and simple which I like üôÇ
Clean üëåthanks for making it ad free. Most of the required features are free of cost
After 25 or so other pomodoro apps and trackers, I finally found the one that WORKS! Definitely worth the pro subscribe to give a pat on the backs to the developers.
ras4vb: Thank you very much for your review!

review: One of the best apps ever. It has all the features you will need in a pomodoro app and that too for free.

Incredible design. No ads. Dark mode. Allows for customization of alarms and timers. A very functional pomodoro app. Supports tags (labels), logging, and report summary. Beautiful pie chart for the summary. Has a calendar that isn't integrated with your phone's calendar. It's stand out feature is the ability to track your actions throughout the day. Combined with another Todo list with GTD this becomes complete.

The app is great except for the bugs it has, there are two bugs I face personally: 1- sometimes when I pause the timer and exit the app for some time, the timer reset itself and the notification bar shows "loading...". 2- the second one is the most annoying to me, which is, when I view tags and the time I spent doing them in the calendar section, the time of one tag shows a very big negative number. I hope you are working on fixing these bugs.
ras4vb: Thank you for your review. Please contact us at zeitic.co@gmail.com and we will try our best to assist you with these issues.
